ai.summary: Erewash Circular Walk 21 is a 9.6 km loop in the UK that offers a moderately challenging circuit through countryside, fields and woodland near the Erewash area. The route is suitable for confident walkers and features a mix of scenic views and rural paths.
ai.terrain_summary: Combination of well made footpaths, compact gravel tracks, grassy fields and short woodland sections. Expect gentle gradients with occasional stile crossing and uneven surfaces; mud possible after rain; some road sections.
ai.safety_notes: Plan for daylight hours and start early in shorter days. Wear sturdy footwear and weather appropriate clothing. Bring water and a snack. Stay on public paths and watch for traffic on country lanes. Mind farm animals and gates; keep gates closed. Use a map or GPS and carry a mobile phone with emergency contacts. If weather is poor or visibility is low, consider postponement.
recommended_gear: Sturdy hiking boots or shoes with good grip
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn; feasible in winter with proper gear and daylight planning.

seo.title: Erewash Circular Walk 21 - 9.6 km Moderate UK Hike
seo.meta_description: Explore the 9.6 km Erewash Circular Walk 21. A moderate circular route in the UK featuring varied landscapes, countryside lanes and woodland sections. Practical safety tips and gear.
